Race.SpecificTitle: PW Proposition No. 1 of 2 -- 1 Mill Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of one (1) mill on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $63,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the public health unit in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Proposition No. 2 of 2 -- 1/4% S&U Tax Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 2 of 2
(Sales & Use Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect, and adopt an ordinance providing for the levy and collection, of a tax of one-fourth of one percent (1/4%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $318,610 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) upon the sale at retail, the use, lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish, all as defined by law, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning July 1, 2021, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expense of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated and used for the purpose of providing a solid waste recycling program for the Parish, including paying the costs of constructing, acquiring, maintaining and/or operating facilities and equipment required in connection therewith, and to pay other costs of collecting and disposing solid waste for the Parish?
